item.title: Record short 1-2 minute Screen-casting videos - Upwork
item.description:
If you have a good microphone and screen recording software, this might be something for you!

What we are doing:
We are an online education company and we create educational tutorial videos on YouTube about online problems.

Requirements:
- Decent microphone
- Screen recording software (OBS)
- Proficiency in english
- Bonus: voice over experience

Tasks:
1. Video creation
You will be recording video tutorials about how to download a specific game on steam. All videos are structured the same, therefore it is very straight forward.
Most videos are typically between 1-3 minutes long, can be recorded in one go and therefore don't require any editing.

We will present you with topics like "How to download f1 24 on PC" - and you record a short tutorial, that explains how people can install steam if they have not already, and how they can find the game in the steam store and how they can download or purchase it. Important: We don't show any illegal ways to get games, we just present official options.

Here is a short 2 minute video that explains this job position in more detail: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mKxYsgE8-_bR1q-rZLzvXfvArf530dda/view?usp=sharing

Payment
The payment is per video. We are looking for dedicated freelancers that can complete this job within a couple of days - under a week. Recording one video takes around 3 minutes, because no editing is required. Therefore, this project can be completed within 2-3 hours.
= 40 videos for $25.00.


Get started
If you are interested in working together, DM me a short video sample that includes your human voice over and we will take things from there! (video sample can be about anything: e.g. "How to create a folder on pc")

Best regards
The TresoDigital Team

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 30, 2024 15:08 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Explainer Video, Screencasting Video, Voice-Over, Voice Acting
Skills: Video Production, Explainer Video, Screencasting Video, Voice-Over, Voice Acting
Country: Austria
click to apply

item.title: Professional TikTok Ad Video Editor Needed for High-Converting Affiliate Marketing - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am looking for a talented and experienced TikTok ad video editor to create compelling scripts and high-quality videos for my affiliate marketing campaigns. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of TikTok trends, creative storytelling, and the ability to produce engaging content that drives conversions.

Project Overview:

I promote a variety of items on TikTok as an affiliate. My goal is to create eye-catching and persuasive ad videos that will capture the attention of viewers and convert them into customers. Here are two examples of the type of content I am aiming to produce:

• Hot Items Hubb TikTok
• TikTok Example

Responsibilities:

• Develop creative and engaging scripts for TikTok ad videos.
• Edit and produce high-quality TikTok videos that align with current trends and effectively promote the products.
• Ensure videos are optimized for maximum engagement and conversion.
• Collaborate with me to understand the products and target audience.
• Incorporate feedback and make necessary revisions to achieve the desired outcome.

Requirements:

• Proven experience in creating successful TikTok ads or similar short-form video content.
• Strong video editing skills using software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.
• Creativity and ability to think outside the box to create unique and engaging content.
• Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively.
• Understanding of TikTok algorithms and best practices for maximizing reach and engagement.
• Ability to provide sample videos of previous work to demonstrate capability.

Application Instructions:

Please provide the following in your proposal:

• Examples of previous TikTok ad videos or similar work.
• A brief outline of your approach to creating a high-converting TikTok ad.
• Your availability and estimated timeline for completing a video.
• Your rate for this project.
• Sample videos of your previous work to prove your ability to create content similar to the examples provided.

I look forward to working with a creative professional who can help me take my affiliate marketing efforts to the next level on TikTok.

Thank you!


Posted On: June 30, 2024 15:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Hiring For A Faceless YouTube Channel Video Production In the Finance and AI Niches - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking talented freelancers to join our team for a new faceless YouTube channel. As we aim to maintain anonymity, your work will involve behind-the-scenes tasks that contribute to the overall success and growth of the channel. We are looking for individuals with the following skills and experience:Video Editing, Graphic, Design, Content research, Scriptwriting,SEO and Metadata Optimization

We value clear communication, professionalism, and timely delivery. We will provide detailed briefs, guidelines, and examples for each task to ensure that you have a clear understanding of our expectations. Regular communication via email or project management tools will be necessary to discuss progress, clarify requirements, and address any questions or concerns.

We prefer freelancers who can meet deadlines consistently and are open to feedback and revisions. Payment will be discussed on an individual basis, considering factors such as experience, skill level, and complexity of the task. We aim to establish long-term working relationships with reliable freelancers who share our vision for the channel's growth.

If you are interested in joining our team, please provide your portfolio, resume, or samples of your work along with your application. We look forward to reviewing your application and discussing further details with selected candidates.








Budget: $20
Posted On: June 30, 2024 14:46 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Animation, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Animation, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a Video Editor to edit our Facebook ad creatives - Upwork
item.description:
As a Video Editor specializing in Facebook ad creatives, your role is pivotal in translating ad briefs into captivating visual content. You will collaborate closely with our creative team to produce high-quality video ads that effectively generate sales.

We are a dynamic eCommerce brand dedicated to delivering beauty products to our customers. Your mission is to create compelling ad creatives that resonate with our audience and drive engagement and sales.

Responsibilities:
- Edit 5-10 ad briefs per week, adhering to project timelines and quality standards.
- Source and incorporate relevant video clips from the internet to enhance ad content.
- Organize and upload edited ads into designated folders for seamless team access and management.
- Listen to and implement feedback from the creative team to refine ad creatives and optimize performance.

Requirements:
- 1 year of experience in video editing or designing ads.
- 1 year of experience in CapCut, Photoshop, and Adobe Premiere Pro.
- 1 year of experience in editing eCommerce ads.
- Working in a team environment and understanding individual roles.

Character Traits:
- Excruciatingly high level of attention to detail with all design and edits.
- Artistic and creative oriented mindset.
- Willing to do the boring work required.
- Time efficient.
- Coachable and ready to learn new things.

This role is not suitable if:
- You don't pay attention to detail.
- You don't invest the necessary time into creating high-quality creative.
- You are unorganized.
- You don't understand eCommerce.
- You aren't passionate about growing.

If you are interested in this role and meet the criteria above, then please apply.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 14:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
**Job Posting: Social Media Video Editor**

We are seeking a skilled and knowledgeable video editor with expertise in creating social media reels and content. The ideal candidate should be proficient in the Adobe Suite and possess strong skills in visual effects, sound effects, color correction and adjustments, transitions, and video editing to ensure high-quality output.

Key Responsibilities:
- Edit raw content into engaging social media reels and videos
- Follow provided sample videos closely to maintain consistency
- Apply visual and sound effects to enhance video quality
- Perform color correction and adjustments
- Utilize transitions effectively
- Ensure all content aligns with our brand’s high standards

Qualifications:
- Proficiency in Adobe Suite
- Strong knowledge of visual effects, sound effects, and transitions
- Experience in color correction and video adjustments
- Excellent communication skills
- Passion for learning and improving skills

Our brand focuses on sportswear, so a passion for fitness and product content is a plus. If you are a dedicated and creative video editor looking to make an impact, we would love to hear from you!


PLEASE CHECK OUT OUR SOCIAL MEDIA:

Instagram: @infiniteformclo
https://infiniteformathletics.com/


Posted On: June 30, 2024 14:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects

item.title: Long-Term Video Editor For YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Gooday Freelancers.

Looking for someone who can turn the audio I supply into a YouTube video.

To be 100% honest, you don’t need to be a video editing god, I need someone who really understands making great content, that is not going to get flagged for copyright on YouTube.

Yes, we can all use stock footage, but that is boring!

I used to have 500k subs on YT, 1 billion views, hire a team of 12 people, all within 24-months...however, sadly got done for copyright....year 2019.

So, a few years down the line now & myself working a 9-5 doing something totally different to YouTube, I'd like to try restarting the channel. It still has 420k subscribers, of which many are probably adults now & wouldn't even remember it.

In short, I'm looking for a video editor that can make great content like most...but more importantly great content that isn’t copyrighted. I provide the talkover & script.

Sadly Upwork deleted my old account with all my reviews as I haven’t been active for a while (1,000 employed via Upwork), but you’ll find I’m a pretty chilled person & am more than happy for people to offer suggestions, which if done & make cash, I’ll share the profits on said videos happily.

So, good video editor, good content that is not copyright & maybe we can start something again & like I say, happily award 50% of the profits…one video made 57k last time…that’s be 23k GBP each :)

Content: Mainly list videos, facts. Anything can be explored at the current time....I'd give you 100% of the profits if you get it right. Subs for me, money for you.

So, Who's down?


Budget: $50
Posted On: June 30, 2024 14:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Copyright
Skills: Video Editing, Copyright
Country: Sri Lanka
click to apply

item.title: Experienced YouTube Video Editor for new Channel - Long-term Potential - Upwork
item.description:
I'm seeking a highly skilled and creative video editor to join my team as we launch a new YouTube channel. This is a fantastic opportunity for a dedicated editor to shape the visual style and contribute to the overall success of the channel.

What We're Creating:

Diverse Content: Reaction videos, faceless content, interviews, and traditional "talking head" videos.
Dynamic Editing Style: We want to incorporate engaging elements like news-style overlays for interviews and reactions.
Your Role:

Expert Editing: Bring your technical skills and artistic vision to create polished, professional videos that captivate our audience.
Collaborator & Consultant: Help guide us on the best recording practices (we're currently using Riverside.fm) and software to achieve the desired final product.
Communication & Project Management: Clearly communicate your process, timelines, and any potential challenges. We need someone who can prioritize urgent projects while managing a longer-term content calendar.
Required Skills & Experience:

Proven YouTube Editing Experience: A strong portfolio showcasing your ability to edit various video styles.
Technical Proficiency: Experience with professional editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Creative Flair: A keen eye for visual storytelling and the ability to create engaging content.
Communication & Project Management: Excellent communication skills and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Bonus Skills:

Experience with motion graphics and animation
Familiarity with YouTube SEO and best practices
Compensation & Terms:

Rate/Fee Structure: Please provide your hourly rate or project-based fees.
Long-Term Potential: We are looking for a long-term partner who can grow with our channel. For the right fit, this could lead to a full-time salaried position.
To Apply:

Please submit your proposal with the following:

Your Rate: Hourly or project-based fees.
Portfolio: Links to your most relevant YouTube editing work.
A Brief Introduction: Tell us about your experience and why you're excited about this project.
Availability: Your estimated weekly availability (hours/days).
Let's Create Something Amazing!
I'm excited to collaborate with a talented editor who can help bring this channel to life.

Hourly Range: $4.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 14:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Documentary, Instagram Reels, Audio Editing, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, YouTube Marketing
Skills: Documentary, Instagram Reels, Audio Editing, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, YouTube Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply
